page.title: 13Old people's homes, Swindon.
page.content: There are 5 old people's Homes in Old Town. One of these is a nursing home and the others are residential. These are called Pickton, Lindum, Quarry Mount, and Sunnymead. There are many old people living in the area. They prefer to live in their own home if they feel able to look after themselves. Many organisations care for them, such as 'meals on wheels', Community home help. Young people do community service and become involved with old-age pensioners as part of their Duke of Edinburgh award.Many people live longer today, but they become a problem when they cannot look after themselves. Family ties are loose today,as many families are spread over the country, going where the jobs are, leaving the grandparents behind.
